Key Match Events: Sunil Chhetri's retirement match ended in a 0-0 draw.
Anwar Ali came closest to scoring in the first half.
Gurpreet Singh Sandhu made a crucial save in the second half.
Brandon Fernandes missed a free-kick opportunity in injury time.
Pre-Game Insights: Sunil Chhetri's retirement match was highly anticipated.
India needed a win to progress to the next round.
Post-Match Reflections: The crowd applauded Sunil Chhetri as he took a lap of the ground.
The match marked the end of Sunil Chhetri's international career.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at the Salt Lake Stadium in Kolkata.
India will next face Qatar in the final fixture of this round.
